value.verse: O LORD, do not rebuke me in your anger; *
value.halfverse: do not punish me in your wrath.

value.verse: For your arrows have already pierced me, *
value.halfverse: and your hand presses hard upon me.
there is no soundness in my body, because of my sin.
value.verse:
There is no health in my flesh,
because of your indignation; *

value.halfverse: like a heavy burden they are too much for me to bear.
value.verse: For my iniquities overwhelm me; *

value.halfverse: by reason of my foolishness.
value.verse: My wounds stink and fester *
I am utterly bowed down and prostrate; *
value.halfverse: I go about in mourning all the day long.

value.verse: My loins are filled with searing pain; *
value.halfverse: there is no health in my body.
I wail, because of the groaning of my heart.
value.verse: I am utterly numb and crushed; *
O Lord, you know all my desires, *
value.halfverse: and my sighing is not hidden from you.

value.verse: My heart is pounding, my strength has failed me, *
value.halfverse: and the brightness of my eyes is gone from me.
my neighbors stand afar off.
value.verse: My friends and companions draw back from my affliction; *

value.halfverse:
those who strive to hurt me speak of my ruin
 and plot treachery all the day long.
value.verse: Those who seek after my life lay snares for me; *

value.halfverse: like those who are mute and who do not open their mouth.
value.verse: But I am like the deaf who do not hear, *
I have become like one who does not hear *
value.halfverse: and from whose mouth comes no defense.

value.verse: For in you, O LORD, have I fixed my hope; *
value.halfverse: you will answer me, O Lord my God.
those who gloat over me when my foot slips.”
value.verse: For I said, “Do not let them rejoice at my expense, *

value.halfverse: and my pain is always with me.
value.verse: Truly, I am on the verge of falling, *

value.halfverse: and be sorry for my sin.
value.verse: I will confess my iniquity *

value.halfverse: and many in number are those who wrongfully hate me.
value.verse: Those who are my enemies without cause are mighty, *

value.halfverse: because I follow the course that is right.
value.verse: Those who repay evil for good slander me, *

value.halfverse: be not far from me, O my God.
value.verse: O LORD, do not forsake me; *
Make haste to help me, *
value.halfverse: O Lord of my salvation.
